Comment: Let this serve as a warning to those who would quit on games early in, to save their ratings. It doesn't always work. Jonny let's the clock run out after move 4, after suffering a slight setback. The game is rated.
Central pawns. This is how you do it.
Central pawns. This is how you do it.

He dies, and lets the clock run out, probably hoping the game would not wind up rated, but it is, and he's lost a game official and on the record due more to cowardice than ineptitude. Take that, Jonny97!
